caption.p: Liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry (LC-MS) analysis of the two types of Polygonum multiflorum: ( A) seed seedling (SS) and culture seedling (CS). ( B) Chemical structure of 2,3,5,4′-tetrahydroxystilbene-2- O- β- d-glucoside (TSG). ( C) Fourier transform near-infrared spectrum (Blue peak SS; Red peak CS). ( D) UV chromatogram of the LC-MS results for the CS- and SS-derived plant. The detection wavelengths were 254 and 315 nm, and the red arrow indicates the TSG peak.
